results.title: Glory and fame
results.creator_credit: Ayesha Lai, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: Ayesha Lai came from a big family from many different cultures. But one thing her family shared is their love for Australian Rules football. Ayesha tells of how she developed her passion for the game, through her brothers and reading about the great Indigenous footballers who played for Essendon. Eventually she threw her support behind the club, which culminated in meeting and talking with Kevin Sheedy.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Ayesha Lai, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI

results.title: Prayer for fame
results.creator_credit: Angela Josifoska, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: Angela Josifoska, a teenager living in Melbourne’s western suburbs, tells of her quest for fame. She shares her early youth and the things that interested her throughout her life, culminating in a passion for performance. She candidly shares her dreams and ambitions for the future and her determination to succeed shines through.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Angela Josifoska, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI

results.title: Just smile and shine
results.creator_credit: Anna Huynh, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: Anna Huynh tells of how she learned the hard way the pitfalls of trying to fit in. Looking different to everyone else, she tried doing everything her peers were doing and it took her further away from herself. In being true to herself, she discovered the true friendship and, ultimately, her true self.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Anna Huynh, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI

results.title: The Bribe
results.creator_credit: Ashlea Thomas, Legacy and ACMI Digital Storytelling
results.brief_description: It took the bribe of a new phone by her mother to convince Ashlea to go on a Legacy camp. As much as she missed her father, she didn’t want his death to define her. At the camp, Ashlea started to make friends and became a member of Legacy, which she has been a part of ever since.

results.title: A New path
results.creator_credit: Verity Hollingworth, Legacy and ACMI Digital Storytelling
results.brief_description: After realising that something was missing in her corporate job, Verity took a short term contract with Legacy and has been with them ever since. She talks about the care, diligence and passion of her fellow workmates and how working for Legacy has brought her closer to her own family and her family’s history.

results.title: My journey
results.creator_credit: Michelle Johnstone, Legacy and ACMI Digital Storytelling
results.brief_description: Dad taught me about photography, cooking, Geelong Football Club and Legacy. Michelle tells of how she joined as a junior legatee and how being a member of legacy has given her the confidence in life and has helped her to become who she is today.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Michelle Johnstone, Legacy and ACMI Digital Storytelling

results.title: Ken's great times with Legacy
results.creator_credit: Ken Hellnig, Legacy and ACMI Digital Storytelling
results.brief_description: Ken joined Legacy after his dad’s death. He went on the first Legacy camp in his early 20s and he shares with us his years with Legacy, the camps, day trips, boating adventures and the friends made over the years.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Ken Hellnig, Legacy and ACMI Digital Storytelling

results.title: Anne's Legacy
results.creator_credit: Dulcie Cedaro, Legacy and ACMI Digital Storytelling
results.brief_description: Encouraged by her daughter, Anne, to get out there and keep busy, Dulcie started to volunteer. Through the volunteer work, Dulcie remembered her time at Legacy when she was 12 and decided to join up again. This restored her quality of life and brought her back in contact with the community that would provide support after Anne died.

results.title: Families and life
results.creator_credit: Suzanne Shaw, Legacy and ACMI Digital Storytelling
results.brief_description: A letter to her family and future generations, Suzanne tells of her family history, especially of her father and husband in war and how Legacy helped her with her grief and loss and helped her to move forward with her life.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Suzanne Shaw, Legacy and ACMI Digital Storytelling

results.title: Family
results.creator_credit: Rebecca Cherry, Legacy and ACMI Digital Storytelling
results.brief_description: Rebecca has been involved in various capacities in Legacy since her father died when she was seven. Rebecca talks about the different families in her life, especially the one she has found at Legacy. She has gone from being a Rotary Exchange student to a Legacy leader.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Rebecca Cherry, Legacy and ACMI Digital Storytelling
